ModSettings.name: Force of Nature
ModSettings.title: [Spell] Force of Nature
ModSettings.description:
This is a Nature-themed 'Chaos Channel'-like spell, but for the Nature school.
Force of Nature provides for 1 of the following unit buffs:
1. Ironskin (+3 Armor) 2. Pathfinding 3. Poison-Touch (str 4 poison melee attack)
Pathfinding will only apply to non-pathfinding unit. Poison-Touch will only apply to non-ranged units.
If a unit is inappropriately randomly selected for the above, then that choice will be disgarded and another buff will be selected.
Additionally, unlike Chaos Channels, unit icons are distinct for the 3 different bestowed attributes, making it easier to see what each unit actually does.
